trans-unit.target: Endatai qua il titel per la novitad.

trans-unit.source: The news alias is a unique reference to the article which can be called instead of its numeric ID.
trans-unit.target: L'alias da novitads è ina referenza unica ad in artitgel che po vegnir utilisà enstagl da l'ID numerica.

trans-unit.source: Here you can change the author of the news item.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus midar l'autur da la novitad.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the date according to the global date format.
trans-unit.target: Endatai la data tenor il format global da datas.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the time according to the global time format.
trans-unit.target: Endatai il temp tenor il format global da temp.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a subheadline.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus endatar in suttitel.

trans-unit.source: The news teaser can be shown in a news list instead of the full article. A "read more …" link will be added automatically.
trans-unit.target: Il teaser da la novitad po vegnir mussà en glistas da novitads enstagl da l'artitgel cumplet. I vegn agiuntà automaticamain ina colliaziun «Leger dapli…».

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the news text.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus endatar il text da la novitad.

trans-unit.source: Add an image to the news item.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar a la novitad in maletg.

trans-unit.source: Add one or more downloadable files to the news item.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar ina u pliras datotecas per telechargiar da la novitad.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the files you want to attach.
trans-unit.target: Tscherner las datotecas che vus vulais agiuntar.

trans-unit.source: Here you can override the default redirect target.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus midar la destinaziun a la quala ils lecturs vegnan renviads.

trans-unit.source: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to the default page of the news archive.
trans-unit.target: Cun cliccar sin «leger dapli…» vegnan ils visitaders renviads a la pagina normala per quest archiv da novitads

trans-unit.source: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to a page.
trans-unit.target: Cun cliccar sin «leger dapli…» vegnan ils visitaders renviads ad ina pagina.

trans-unit.source: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to an article.
trans-unit.target: Cun cliccar sin «leger dapli…» vegnan ils visitaders renviads ad in artitgel.

trans-unit.source: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to an external website.
trans-unit.target: Cun cliccar sin «leger dapli…» vegnan ils visitaders renviads ad ina pagina web externa.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the page to which visitors will be redirected when clicking the news item.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna la pagina a la quala ils visitaders duain vegnir renviads sch'els cliccan sin la novitad.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the article to which visitors will be redirected when clicking the news item.
trans-unit.target: Tscherni l'artitgel al qual ils visitaders duain vegnir renviads sch'els cliccan sin la novitad.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter one or more classes.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina u pliras classas.

trans-unit.source: Do not allow comments for this particular news item.
trans-unit.target: Betg lubir da commentar questa novitad.

trans-unit.source: Show the news item in a featured news list.
trans-unit.target: Mussar questa novitad en glistas da novitads favurisadas.

trans-unit.source: Make the news item publicly visible on the website.
trans-unit.target: Render visibel publicamain questa novitad sin la pagina web.

trans-unit.source: Do not show the news item on the website before this day.
trans-unit.target: Betg mussar la novitad sin la pagina web avant quest di.

trans-unit.source: Do not show the news item on the website on and after this day.
trans-unit.target: Betg mussar la novitad sin la pagina web quest di e pli tard.

trans-unit.source: Date and time of the latest revision
trans-unit.target: La data ed il temp da l'ultima versiun
Crear in nov artitgel da novitads.

trans-unit.source: Show the details of news article ID %s
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils detagls da l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s.
Modifitgar l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s.
Dublegiar l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s.
Spustar l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s.
Stizzar l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s.
Publitgar/betg publitgar l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s.
Promover / betg pli promover l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s
Encollar suenter l'artitgel da novitads cun l'ID %s.
